p.d: No dad is bad in the beginning! Our fathers nowadays are alienated by their families and treated indifferently by their children! Now as they spend 48 hours with their children without Mothers, we'll see their tear-filled child-rearing challenge! Star fathers return home of their own free will! These work-focused fathers are returning to their rightful place on 'The Return of Superman'.
